title: Book Cover, "Vintage Crime: Hammett: The Continental"
description: Front cover, black and white close up photographic image of a man's face  in three-quarter view wearing a large brimmed hat. Upper right corner, blue rectangle containing author's name in pale blue text. Lower fourth of page has title in three lines of blue text. Below title, Vintage Crime/Black Lizard logo. Above title to the right, five lines of book review in pale blue text. Back cover, three lines of book review in pale blue text. Below book review, book title in blue above five lines of book description, two lines of book review and three lines of contributors, all in pale blue text on black ground. At lower part of page, Vintage Crime/Black Lizard logo. Spine, author's name in pale blue and last name in rectangle. Title in blue text with Vintage Crime/Black Lizard logo.

tombstone.epitaph: Book Cover, "Vintage Crime: Hammett: The Continental". offset lithography. Gift of Steven Heller. 1996-74-191.
